Html:
I read this thread with the same title: http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=27552  and I am guessing I have the same issue, but I'd like to be sure what I need to do. From phpinfo(); I *think* that I dont have the required libraries installed, but I'm not even 100% sure where to look. Here's a snippet from "Configure Command"

' '--disable-xmlreader' '--disable-xmlwriter'

Does that mean I need them to recompile PHP with those modules enabled?
Yes, you will need at least xmlwriter to create .xlsx files. If you are creating just .xls files it is not needed.
